What is family income? family day care.answer: Combined annual family income is one of the three factors that determines the amount of Child Care Subsidy a family is entitled to. Under the Child Care Subsidy, the percentage of subsidy a family is entitled to is based on their combined annual income, with more financial support available to lower income families.
